name: Thrilled to see @manton added experimental support for Indiepaper in Micro.blog! Give it a try, folks, and let me know what you think.

content.html: Thrilled to see @manton added experimental support for Indiepaper in Micro.blog! Give it a try, folks, and let me know what you think.

summary: @cleverdevil Got to admit I don't really understand what's going on. I've signed up for IndiePaper and Aperture, but nothing seems to be happening when I save a page with the bookmarklet or the macOS app. Is there a single overview that explains how all these parts fit together?

content.html: @cleverdevil Got to admit I don't really understand what's going on. I've signed up for IndiePaper and Aperture, but nothing seems to be happening when I save a page with the bookmarklet or the macOS app. Is there a single overview that explains how all these parts fit together?
content.value: @cleverdevil Got to admit I don't really understand what's going on. I've signed up for IndiePaper and Aperture, but nothing seems to be happening when I save a page with the bookmarklet or the macOS app. Is there a single overview that explains how all these parts fit together?

summary:
@devilgate not yet, and I could definitely create some more docs! Did you sign in using the Aperture URL? aperture.p3k.io 
If you do that, you’ll be able to pick a channel to send saved articles to.
